152879.「おや キミは……？\n<br>\n「すまないが 何も聞かずに\n これを受け取:
Oh, you're...? I'm sorry, but if you could just take this without asking... I've got the wishing star bracelet! The wishing star bracelet began to glow faintly in the hand of...!It's a pale blue with reddish hints of sparkle. I've never seen anything as pure as this. Thank you for the star's guidance...
Your name is... Hmm. It's you. I thought I didn't recognize you, but you're new. I know you're a good student, but I need a favor... When you get your hands
on something called the Meteor Medal, I want you to deliver it to me... For every medal you collect, I'll carve a rune into your
wishing star bracelet that will help you in the school. What do you think? It's not a bad deal, is it? If you're interested, just give
me a call...

152880.「よく来たね <pc>君。\n 私にできることであれば チカラになるよ。\n<b: I'm glad you're here<pc> You. If there's anything I can do to help...<break>

152902.「流星メダルは 魔法に似たチカラを秘めている\n この学園内でしか手に入らない:
The Meteor Medal has magical powers that can only be found in this school. I don't know that much about it myself. I need more meteor
medals for my research... If you could find them and deliver them to me, that would be...

152903.「これまでの調査によれば 流星メダルは\n 人の感情が 大きく動いた時 周囲の魔:
According to the research I've done so far, meteor medals appear when people's emotions run high and the concentration of magic
around them exceeds a certain level. If we combine the information from the school and the distribution of magic concentration, we
can calculate where and how many meteor medals we can get... I can also check when I use the wishing star bracelet, so I can use
it to collect meteor medals...

152904.「流星メダルの 特殊なエネルギーを利用して\n 願い星のブレスに ルーンを刻めば:
If you use the special energy of the meteor medal to carve runes into the wishing star's bracelet, you can manipulate its direction to
some degree. If you collect the right number of meteor medals, I can carve runes on them that will be useful...

152905.「同じルーンを 複数回刻み込むことで\n ある程度 効果を高められるよ。\n た:
By inscribing the same rune multiple times, the effect can be enhanced to some degree. But there are limits, so be careful... As my
research progresses, I may be able to figure out a way to layer the runes more efficiently, but that will take time. We'll
have to wait and see... Also, the effects of the carved runes were confirmed when I used the wishing star bracelet. I'll use it too.
